entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
